description: Overlooking a square of monumental beauty where tables are laid out for alfresco dining in summer, Regina Lucia is well worth a visit even when it’s not fine enough to sit outside. In a dining room with plenty of historic character, enjoy classic Sicilian cuisine reinterpreted with a creative twist – and make sure you don’t miss the delicious desserts!
